endpoints.description: Retrieve a summary of the investor's real estate investment portfolio.
Create a new investor portfolio entry for real estate investments.
Fetch detailed information about a specific investment portfolio.
Update the specified investment portfolio details.
Remove a specific investment portfolio from the system.
Access market insights and trends for the real estate industry.
Submit properties for analysis and valuation within the context of the investor's portfolio.
Retrieve current trends and forecasts for specified real estate markets.
Generate and download performance reports for a specific portfolio.
Log a new transaction or activity within a designated investment portfolio.
